directions: Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat. Add tomato, red bell pepper, onion, zucchini, and mushrooms; cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes. Add rice, ketchup, bacon, paprika, salt, and black pepper; stir well to combine. Transfer to serving plate.
Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat. Pour in eggs in a thin layer; cook until set, about 5 minutes. Serve eggs over rice mixture.
ingredients: 1 small tomato, sliced, or more to taste
1 slice cooked bacon, chopped, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Omelet for Leftovers (Omurice)
